Launched from Lahore with a 10-kg explosive payload, the drone was intended for Jalandhar but was intercepted by Army Air Defence. Pakistan deployed numerous such drones during the clashes.

But while the law sharpens punishment for institutions, it leaves students exposed. This explainer decodes what happens to degrees when universities are shut, what current law says — and why students must verify recognition before admission.

The proposed bill aims to revamp rural employment with a new framework.

description: Australia’s Skills in Demand visa allows employers to sponsor overseas workers when suitable local candidates are unavailable. Employers must meet nomination, skills, English language, and income threshold requirements. Visa stays range up to four years, with extended eligibility for Hong Kong passport holders.

Pak national, unemployed: What we know about Bondi beach shooters — key findings
description: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as a father-son duo unleashed gunfire at a Hanukkah event, claiming at least 15 lives. The attackers, identified as Sajid and Naveed Akram, opened fire from a footbridge. Police neutralised Sajid, while Naveed was apprehended. Investigations are underway, with possible links to extremist groups being explored.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind Jan market rout
description: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: Why from Bihar & why now? Nitin Nabin takes charge as BJP working prez; big signal by party
description: Nitin Nabin, a 45-year-old Bihar minister, has been appointed BJP's working president, positioning him to become the youngest national president. His selection, seen as a strategic move by Prime Minister Modi and Amit Shah, signals a generational shift within the party. Nabin's five-term MLA experience and organizational skills have been highlighted as key factors in his rapid ascent.

title: Bukayo Saka & Tolami Benson net worth 2025: Earnings, brands, lifestyle
description: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka is a financial powerhouse, with his net worth projected around $30 million by 2025, fueled by his lucrative club contract and major endorsement deals. His partner, Tolami Benson, also boasts an independent career in public relations and investments, contributing to their combined financial standing. Saka's marketability continues to soar.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star’s homes and lifestyle
description: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: New study reveals surprising effects for those who took the Covid-19 vaccine
description: A recent large-scale study has produced results that may challenge assumptions on Covid-19 vaccination. Examining health outcomes across millions of adults, the research highlights patterns that go beyond immediate infection prevention. The findings raise intriguing questions about the broader impact of vaccination, offering insight for both supporters and skeptics alike.

title: Vanessa Bryant emotional as UConn, USC honour Kobe and Gigi in on-court tribute
description: The UConn Huskies beat the USC Trojans by 28 points. The game became emotional as players honored Kobe and Gigi Bryant. Both teams wore different Kobe sneakers. Vanessa Bryant shared pictures of the athletes on her Instagram. This tribute highlighted the lasting impact of Kobe and Gigi on basketball. Gigi had wished to play for UConn.

title: From tech city to tanker city: Inside Bengaluru’s deepening water crisis
description: Bengaluru's water crisis deepens as residents rely on state-run tankers, a temporary fix for a failing system. Decades of neglect have decimated ancient lake networks, leaving the city dependent on costly, unreliable water sources. This reliance on tankers, while offering immediate relief, masks a critical need for long-term solutions to prevent a future water emergency.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
description: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: Connor McDavid reacts after Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
description: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.
